title: Ticket #7822: Build 8.8 for EPEL 6
description:
EPEL 6 currently only has condor 8.6.11. We should add the latest 8.8.

Do we need any sort of compat library or config files?
remarks:
2020-Aug-26 11:57:47 by tim:
We should take the same approach that OSG did and provide a default configuration that works as before.
creator: matyas
